column4: Is anyone here pretty familiar with conky?  I have it setup to display cpu load information on a quad core processor.    It displays the % of cpu power used correctly, but the bar graph does not reflect the % used.  ie.  % = 100%  bar graph shows roughly 25% used.  Any ideas?
check the conky forums and other example conky configs. There may be some little oversight in your configs.
its also possible its showing both cpus combined.
